com.example.mapnector.GroupManagement

Class CreateGroupSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.mapnector.GroupManagement.CreateGroupSystem

  • public class CreateGroupSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    a small class that is used to help create a new group via dialog; made to split the work on LVHelper

    • Method Detail

      • getBtnCreateGroup

        public android.widget.Button getBtnCreateGroup()

      • createGroup

        public Group createGroup()
        Checks if all required fields fill in correctly in the dialog; if so create new group and return it to the listView that will pass it to the firebase
        Returns:
        the new group that was created form the filled data; if something wrong(error, empty fields) returns null

      • showDialog

        public void showDialog()

      • showUpdateDialog

        public void showUpdateDialog(Group g)
        show dialog to update group settings
        Parameters:
        g - group to update settings
